means: 不受法律支配的，未经法律制定的

sentence.Network_en: The trust was simply an extralegal arrangement by which competing manufacturers pooled properties to achieve monopoly.
sentence.Network_cn: 托拉斯单纯是一种超法律的安排,通过它,互相竞争的制造家实行联营,以便垄断.

sentence.Network_en: There is no excuse for the extralegal Methods : That went under the name of Watergate.
sentence.Network_cn: 以水门事件为名使用非法律手段是没有理由的.

sentence.Network_en: There were only extralegal recourses for their grievances.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的冤屈只能用法律规定范围之外的手段来解决.
